name: NSCollectionLayoutEnvironment
desc: A protocol used to provide information about the layout's container and environment traits, such as size classes and display scale factor.

items.name: var container: NSCollectionLayoutContainer
items.desc: Information about the layout's container, such as its size and content insets.

items.name: var traitCollection: UITraitCollection
items.desc: The traits that describe the current environment of the layout, such as the size classes and display scale factor.
